body.p: The Board noted that it is neither necessary nor appropriate to measure the fair value of goods or services as well as the fair value of the share‑based payment for every transaction in which the entity receives goods or non‑employee services. However, when the value of the identifiable consideration received appears to be less than the fair value of the share‑based payment, measurement of both the goods or the services received and the share‑based payment may be necessary in order to measure the value of the unidentifiable goods or services received.
